title: Why Is There So Much Negativity On This Forum?
body:
It seems every post I come across people are just complaining, complaining, complaining. People whining about a single aspect of League they don't like and calling Riot a "sh*t company", and people who vehemently criticize other people's behavior in-game as if it's a personal matter. Like jeez o man, can't we all just get along?

Then again the main demographic for this game is younger people so I shouldn't be surprised. Lol.
